A weed dealer and a longtime fan of The Happytime Gang.
A disgraced ex-cop who is now a private investigator. He was the first puppet to become a police officer, but was fired from the force after accidentally killing Sandra's father.

Lyle, an actor on The Happytime Gang who played a sports coach and is now a drug lord, and Junkyard, a member of Lyle's drug gang.
